actions.description: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d8 + 2 force damage.
actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend

actions.description: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + 2 hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.
actions.name: Repair (3/Day)

actions.description: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.
actions.name: [Reaction] Deflect Attack

languages: Understands the languages its owner speaks
name: Steel Defender

specialTraits.description: The following numbers increase by 1 when your proficiency bonus increases by 1: the defender's skill and saving throw bonuses (above), the bonuses to hit and damage of its rend attack, and the number of hit points restored by its Repair action (below).
specialTraits.name: Might of the Master

specialTraits.description: All actions require your bonus action
specialTraits.name: Obedient
